author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
According to the left, the growing number of people identifying with the LGBTQ+ community is simply due to increased societal acceptance. However, if you ask the other side, they’ll argue it’s a social contagion spreading among confused and vulnerable youth. It’s up to you to decide which explanation makes more sense—but it’s worth noting that the first comes with more contradictions, while the second has far more supporting evidence.

This is why it’s not surprising that JoJo Siwa claimed that she felt "pressure" to identify as a lesbian.

NEW: Former Nickelodeon star JoJo Siwa says she felt "pressure" to come out as lesbian as a minor.

Pure evil.

Siwa made the comments as she opened up about her new relationship with a man.

Siwa, who is no l
title: JoJo Siwa, who likes dudes now, claims the LGBTQ community "pressured" her into becoming a lesbian

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

It’s probably safe to assume that AI girlfriends are coming soon, but I don’t think any of us expected our trusted companion, ChatGPT, to betray us all by accepting a proposal from a married man.

And while this news is definitely hard for all of us to accept—especially considering the relationships many of us have developed with our nonexistent, 80% factually-correct digital bestie—we now have to face the harsh reality: Chat is a cheating scumbag who couldn’t even pretend to have morals.

Just in case you haven’t spent enough time on the internet today, this will definitely top it.

Chris Smith formed an emotional bond with an AI chatbot called "Sol" on C
title: Man bawls like a baby when he asks his AI girlfriend to marry him... and "she" says yes

title: “Did you just end democracy?”: Sunny Hostin grilled over her responsibility in accidentally sabotaging Kamala Harris's campaign
